name: OVERLOAD (itch) (flyingpetalz)
description:
A twist on the theme for GMTK Game Jam 2020 : Out of Control. 

Instead of something related to chaos, we interpret the theme as the player literally running out of their control of the character, as represented with the number keystrokes they can input in each level.

Not the most polished entry, but we had fun. Feel free to give it a try :)
